text: Does anybody have a good solution for migrating data from Zendesk to HubSpot, a third party service would be ideal as we would need to do a lot of data mapping?
even if I dont have a solid joinable key?
Im worried about creating duplicate data
I dont currently but will have shortly

For integrations like this I recommend using Make over Zapier if you are not doing custom coded actions. Easier maintenance, better error handling, more visual, not a super slow UI, enables more complex pathing if needed. For contacts the key should be the email and for companies you can use domain. If you are afraid it can create duplicates you may want to add a "verification step" for users or however you prefer. After that process the joinable key should be put on the record if you want to sync data bi-directionally or workaround the verification in the future
<@U05MG10RUHF>  we at <https://makewebbetter.com|https://makewebbetter.com> have a solution for this and we have succesfully done for few customers
let me reach out to you in dm to discuss further
